# pycounts

[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/Kabilan108/pycounts/branch/dev/graph/badge.svg?token=2CWJI58ASX)](https://codecov.io/gh/Kabilan108/pycounts)

Calculate word counts in a text file!

## Installation

```bash
$ pip install pycounts
```
